summary: Elizabeth C. Feeley was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). The documents provided are payroll and certification reports that list her name, salary, and employment dates. She appears in payroll certifications for April 1978, August 1978, and December 1978. The documents indicate she was employed by the committee during this period.
significance: Elizabeth C. Feeley's significance lies in her employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations. While the documents do not specify her exact role, her presence on the payroll indicates she contributed to the committee's work during its investigation.
